about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I thrive when facing unexpected challenges and venturing into uncharted territory. My engineering background combined with product management expertise allows me to bridge technical possibilities with business outcomes.

My approach centers on creating new capabilities rather than just optimizing existing ones. I craft POCs to reduce risks and sell ideas, break down complex problems into smaller milestones, and build bridges between stakeholders to drive execution from inception to delivery.
With experience across 7 European markets and versatility from ideation to maintenance, I've consistently delivered results that matter:
skills: Transforming ideas into tangible products through rapid prototyping
Building connections between technical teams and business stakeholders
Using data to inform decisions and demonstrate product vision
Managing roadmaps for teams responsible for significant revenue
about.closing: When I'm not building products, I enjoy sailing - perhaps why I naturally gravitate toward navigating complexity and finding paths through uncertain waters.

items.content: Having Lucas on the team has not only enabled us to deliver features but also to generate substantial value and revenue for SSK. His advocacy for value generation has been instrumental in our success.

Lucas stands out for his operational excellence. He's dedicated to quickly and efficiently solving problems with smart solutions. His knack for critical thinking, adept questioning, and relentless pursuit of the best outcomes make him a standout among his colleagues.

Lucas came and out of the bat tried to make a difference in a subtle way. He is commended for his knowledge of product practices, cleverness, curiosity, and keen thinking process. He is able to challenge, push and promote without being seen as 'pushy'.

Lukas has done a great job within the SSK team to complete multiple initiatives and solve large challenges within the platform. His work was organized well for all the project stakeholders and major elements of projects were documented well.

Working with Lucas is a continuous opportunity for professional growth, thanks to his critical thinking and ability to provide constructive feedback that improves the team's collective work. His contribution to the team is essential, and I consider him a highly valuable asset.

Lucas is straightforward, thoughtful, committed and efficient. Having him onboard ensures the job gets done fast and secure. Curious about new approaches and way of doing things, he is the right person for performing in depth analysis and building creative solutions.

author.name: Laetitia

items.content: His sharp commercial sense with focus on customer needs and value delivered to them has always permitted us to tailor win-win solutions for all stake holders. He has strong, unshakable values anchored in responsibility, rigour and perseverance. A true gem.

author.name: Anchal
author.title: Founder of Trenspott | Faculty Co-Chair at IIM Ahmedabad

items.content: Lucas is above all a great strategic thinker with a pragmatic and assertive problem-solving approach. Not only is he independent and chases after his dreams and goals, he has an open spirit and is a fantastic motivator and team member; he teaches, delegates and delivers.

He is someone who has very good sense of responsibility, he is absolutely reliable (does not let you down as regards deadlines), technically sound, and with good client communication and relationship skills.
